str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From an obsolete particle ne- and epos; not speaking, i.e. An infant; figuratively, a simple-minded person, an immature Christian.

str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

str2: (a) I think, (b) I think, judge, (c) I direct the mind to, seek for, (d) I observe, (e) I care for.

str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
